title: Rage Rooms are a TERRIBLE Idea
description:
Today’s show starts with Delony explaining why rage rooms are basically the worst. Then we hear from a woman wondering if she and her husband should have kids, a 25-year-old with a high-paying job opportunity that he’s worried will affect his mental health, and a rock-star boyfriend hoping to help his girlfriend who’s hiding her bulimia from him.
  Rage Rooms are a TERRIBLE Idea
 Should I take a fantastic job offer at the cost of my mental health?
 Should we have kids? It’s a massive decision and I’m overwhelmed
 I think my girlfriend is struggling with Bulimia again. How can I help her?
 Lyrics of the Day: "Testify" - Rage Against the Machine
  Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.

content:encoded:
Today’s show starts with Delony explaining why rage rooms are basically the worst. Then we hear from a woman wondering if she and her husband should have kids, a 25-year-old with a high-paying job opportunity that he’s worried will affect his mental health, and a rock-star boyfriend hoping to help his girlfriend who’s hiding her bulimia from him.

  • Rage Rooms are a TERRIBLE Idea
  • Should I take a fantastic job offer at the cost of my mental health?
  • Should we have kids? It’s a massive decision and I’m overwhelmed
  • I think my girlfriend is struggling with Bulimia again. How can I help her?
  • Lyrics of the Day: "Testify" - Rage Against the Machine

Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
